name: 紅雀メンバーＡ
message: "Koujaku!"
Just then, one of the Beni-Shigure guys runs up.
Koujaku and I quickly pull our hands apart.

name: 紅雀
message: "What's up?"

name: 紅雀メンバーＡ
message: "We got a call from the guys tailing that asshole in the kimono. They said he just went into Oval Tower."

name: 紅雀
message: "Oval Tower..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Isn't that where they control Platinum Jail?"

name: 紅雀
message: "That's only part of it. It's also the Toue Corporation's headquarters."

name: 蒼葉
message: "The Toue Corporation? Why would Ryuuhou go there?"

name: 紅雀
message: "You don't think he might be connected to Toue, do you?"
A hard light enters Koujaku's eyes.

name: 紅雀
message: "Well, that settles it. We're heading for Oval Tower."

name: 紅雀メンバーＡ
message: "Hell yeah!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "But how're we gonna get inside? You can't just walk in, right?"

name: 紅雀
message: "Can we go in through the back?"

name: 紅雀メンバーＡ
message: "Yeah. Your guy went in through an employee entrance. Sounds like the security's pretty loose back there."

name: 紅雀
message: "Then that's our way in."

name: 紅雀メンバーＡ
message: "Got it!"

name: 紅雀
message: "You're coming too, right?"
Koujaku looks at me for confirmation.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Like you even have to ask."

name: 紅雀
message: "That's what bros are for, right?"
Koujaku flashes me a silly smile, and I laugh.
We're breaking into Toue's HQ to find Ryuuhou. It's kinda weird how this whole thing has turned out.
In the beginning, Koujaku and I were after different things, but now our objectives are one and the same.
All that's left on my end... is to stop Toue's plot.

name: 紅雀
message: "Let's move!"

name: 紅雀メンバーＡ
message: "Yeah!"
We head for Oval Tower.
